reviewText: This doc takes u down memory lane with all the old school trailers of movies from the 60-70-80s . I love horror and any type of doc that talks about them. This is a must have !!! Eve if it was filmed in 1987 , that to me just makes owning this even more enjoyable .trailers , interviews , and more ....enjoy
this is a fun visit with old friends; always nice to see forry ackerman, and revisit favorite movies; the quality was not great, but definitely watchable, and seeing it was a hoot!
